00019 W.A_Template = function(args){args = args?args:{}; var self = this;
00020   // control info.
00021   this.version = '0.0.1';
00022   this.name = 'A_Template';
00023 
00024   // handle arguments
00025   this.wps = '80%,80%,xcenter:0,ycenter:0';
00026 
00027   this.core = {};
00028   //this.core = W.style('div', 'green');
00029   this.body = W.style('div');
00030 
00031   // [Event Forwarding]
00032   // forward events for construction-time overriding
00033   this.events = 'onclick,onmouseout,onmouseover'.split(',');
00034   for(var i = 0; i < this.events.length; ++i){
00035     // 'this.on*' run 'this.on*_default' by default
00036     this.body[this.events[i]] = this[this.events[i]];
00037     // forward 'this.body.on*' to 'this.on*'
00038     this[this.events[i]] = this['default_'+ this.events[i]];
00039   }
00040   // [Property Injection on Construction-time]
00041   // property injection: extend/override constructor w/ passed args object
00042   for(var i in args)
00043     eval('this.'+ i +' = args["'+ i +'"];');
00044 
00045   // *will be called once when window.onload fires
00046   // cond: it needs to be added to WPS by 'W.add'
00047   this.onload = function(){};
00048   W.add(this);
00049 };
